name: A Frog Game
description: The object of A Frog Game is to jump and use the frog's tongue to catch flies for lunch. The player is awarded points based on how many flies get caught and also how quickly they are retrieved. Get 10 flies in a row and the player will be rewarded with a 20 point 'multifly' bonus. A two-player competitive mode is also included.
alsoFor: Android, BlackBerry, iPad, iPhone, Nintendo Switch, Windows Phone, Xbox 360 | Combined View
